about.title: ABOUT ME
about.firstParagraph: Hey, I am Augusto, A JR Software Developer, seeking a new opportunity.
about.secondParagraph: Fascinating and curious, when it comes to technology, Always wanting how the things works and why?
about.thirdParagraph: I have a lot of personal projects, in multiple technologies with can be seen below :)

project1.title: Autocad Plugin
project1.firstParagraph: This project has been made for helping automate some function in Autocad, to manage lines of Sugar Cane Planting.

project2.title: API Backend .NET
project2.firstParagraph: Technical Test, That I made for a position of Backend Developer, using .NET ecosystem, API is documented using Swagger, Authentication by JWT, Listing, Pagination, Relationship between tables in database etc...

project3.title: Dashboard Angular
project3.firstParagraph: Project using Angular front-end framework, creating components, pipes, etc. Using Mapbox library, generating map and using 3D resources with ThreeJS, using ChartJS to create interactive and dynamic Charts.
project3.tecs: Technologies: Angular, ThreeJS, Mapbox, ChartJS, WebSocket
